import React, { useState } from "react"; const foodDataInitial = { siparisNotu: "", boyut: "", Pepperoni: false, sucuk: false, domates: false, }; const siparisAlindiInitial = { pizzaName: "", siparisNotu: "", boyut: "", Pepperoni: false, sucuk: false, domates: false, }; export default function SiparisForm() { const [foodData, setFoodData] = useState(foodDataInitial); const [sayac, setSayac] = useState(1); const [siparisAlindi, setSiparisAlindi] = useState(siparisAlindiInitial); const inputChangeHandler = (event) => { let { value, name, checked, type } = event.target; setFoodData({ ...foodData, [name]: type === "checkbox" ? checked : value, }); }; console.log(foodData); const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setFoodData(foodDataInitial); }; const arttirAction = () => { setSayac(sayac + 1); }; const azaltAction = () => { setSayac(sayac - 1); }; return (
